headline: Here’s What Boosted The TJX Companies (TJX) in Q3
summary: ClearBridge Investments, an investment management company, released its “ClearBridge Growth Strategy” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. US equities significantly rallied in the third quarter, with the S&P 500 returning 8.1%. The benchmark Russell Midcap Growth Index surged 2.8%. The investor optimism was driven by better-than-feared tariff outcomes, […]

headline: TJX Companies (TJX): Evaluating Valuation Following Strong Earnings Beats and Analyst Optimism
summary: TJX Companies (TJX) has been attracting fresh attention from investors, thanks to its ongoing pattern of outperforming earnings and revenue estimates, as well as a newly raised outlook despite current economic challenges. This track record is fueling a closer look at the business’s fundamentals and what the future might hold. See our latest analysis for TJX Companies. Confidence around TJX Companies is translating to market action, with the stock gaining momentum based on upbeat quarterly...
